desiCowBreeds.name: Gir
desiCowBreeds.description: Gir is a renowned dairy breed known for its high milk yield and docile nature.

desiCowBreeds.name: Sahiwal
desiCowBreeds.description: Sahiwal is a premier dairy breed known for heat tolerance and high milk production.

desiCowBreeds.name: Red Sindhi
desiCowBreeds.description: Red Sindhi is known for its hardiness and moderate milk yield.

desiCowBreeds.name: Tharparkar
desiCowBreeds.description: Tharparkar is used for both milk and draft purposes, known for resilience in arid zones.

desiCowBreeds.name: Rathi
desiCowBreeds.description: Rathi cows are good milkers and well adapted to the dry regions of Rajasthan.

desiCowBreeds.name: Kankrej
desiCowBreeds.description: Kankrej is a heavy draft breed also yielding good milk.

desiCowBreeds.name: Ongole
desiCowBreeds.description: Ongole bulls are known for strength, cows produce moderate milk.

desiCowBreeds.name: Deoni
desiCowBreeds.description: Deoni cows are good milkers and used for draft power.

desiCowBreeds.name: Hallikar
desiCowBreeds.description: Hallikar is a strong draft breed with limited milk yield.

desiCowBreeds.name: Amrit Mahal
desiCowBreeds.description: Amrit Mahal bulls are highly prized for speed and endurance.

desiCowBreeds.name: Punganur
desiCowBreeds.description: Punganur is one of the smallest cattle breeds in the world.

desiCowBreeds.name: Vechur
desiCowBreeds.description: Vechur is the smallest cattle breed in the world, ideal for homesteads.

desiCowBreeds.name: Krishna Valley
desiCowBreeds.description: Krishna Valley cattle are tall, muscular and suited for plowing.

desiCowBreeds.name: Nagori
desiCowBreeds.description: Nagori breed is used for draft work in arid zones.

desiCowBreeds.name: Malnad Gidda
desiCowBreeds.description: Malnad Gidda is a dwarf breed native to hilly regions.

desiCowBreeds.name: Kasaragod Dwarf
desiCowBreeds.description: Kasaragod Dwarf is known for high fat content in milk.

desiCowBreeds.name: Khillari
desiCowBreeds.description: Khillari breed is known for stamina and fast trotting draft ability.

desiCowBreeds.name: Bachaur
desiCowBreeds.description: Bachaur cattle are small, sturdy and well suited for ploughing.

desiCowBreeds.name: Dangi
desiCowBreeds.color: Red or black with white patches
desiCowBreeds.description: Dangi is known for working in hilly and rainy terrains.

desiCowBreeds.name: Breed20
desiCowBreeds.description: Breed20 is a hardy Indian cow breed known for adaptability and productivity.
